ai-patthana16.53:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in SN 4.)
ai-patthana16.53:0.3_0: this is his partner and children,
ai-patthana16.53:1.1_0: At that time he has a reason for staying with the teaching, but not the text of the teachings.
ai-patthana16.53:1.1_1: (This should be expanded as in brief, the three scopes of proliferation.)
ai-patthana16.53:2.1_0: One who gives rise to improperly.
